Ammonite Crabs can be found on the most coastal areas and the most northern beaches of Fossil Island, as well as in the northern Wyvern Cave.

Locations[edit | edit source]

Location Levels Members Spawns Map
Mushroom Forest2528Maplink
Fossil Island Volcano254Maplink
Wyvern Cave - northern cave257Maplink

Training Combat[edit | edit source]

Ammonite crabs are one of the creatures that are recommended for training of all levels. They are similar to rock and sand crabs as they have virtually no combat stats but have the highest health of all the crabs. Low level players should bring some food.

Like all other crabs, ammonite crabs start off aggressive but will become tolerant of the player after ten minutes. As they must be active in order to be fought, players must reset their aggression timer once they become tolerant.

Drops[edit | edit source]

Drop rates estimated based on 1,170,000 kills from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

The average Ammonite Crab kill is worth 188.03.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
12 July 2018
(update | poll)

Ammonite Crabs now drop a maximum of 2 seaweed spores instead of 1.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The examine text is a reference to the Helix Fossil meme from Twitch Plays Pokémon.
